participant_1.background:
I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
I don't play sports because I enjoy spending my time outdoors filming wildlife.
my parents are science deniers , but un religious.
I have a sweet tooth but I stay in shape.
I'm happy as a human, even with my asthma.

participant_2.background:
I used to look for my biological parents, but I've since accepted that I may never find them.
I'm enjoying my retirement, spending time with my husband and helping others.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I'm afraid of not being able to protect my son from harm.
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

content.text: Hello there! I'm enjoying my weekend so far, thanks for asking.
Hello! That's good to hear. I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm retired now, so I have a lot of time on my hands.
That sounds nice. I'm still working, but I do enjoy my job.
I'm glad to hear that. What do you do for work?
I'm a wildlife filmmaker. I love spending my time outdoors filming animals in their natural habitats.
That sounds like a really interesting job. I've always been fascinated by wildlife.
It is! I get to see some amazing animals up close. I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to see a sloth in the wild.
They're really cool animals. They move very slowly, but they're really peaceful.
I'm glad you're enjoying your job. It sounds like you're really passionate about it.
Thanks! I am. I love what I do.
